name: Bridger Aerospace Group, Inc.
description: Bridger Aerospace Group, Inc. is a leading provider of aerial firefighting services and innovative aerial solutions for the protection of natural resources and infrastructure. Founded in 2014, the company has established itself as a vital player in the firefighting industry, utilizing advanced aircraft technology and a team of experienced professionals to combat wildfires effectively. Bridger Aerospace operates a fleet of specialized aircraft, including the latest generation of air tankers and reconnaissance aircraft, designed to provide rapid response and support during wildfire incidents. The company’s mission is to safeguard communities and ecosystems from the devastating effects of wildfires while promoting sustainable practices in aerial firefighting. Bridger Aerospace also invests in research and development to enhance its operational capabilities and improve safety standards. The company collaborates with government agencies, non-profit organizations, and private sector partners to deliver comprehensive aerial firefighting solutions that mitigate risks and protect the environment. With a strong focus on innovation and community engagement, Bridger Aerospace is committed to making a positive impact on wildfire management and environmental stewardship.
